author: RTÉ News
title: Son urges people stay in after mother's death
description: A man whose mother died due to Covid-19 has urged people to stay in, in order to avoid the loss of a loved one as a result of the virus.
content:
A man whose mother died due to Covid-19 has urged people to stay in, in order to avoid the loss of a loved one as a result of the virus.
Speaking on RTÉ's Liveline, Ciaran O'Rourke said that his 69-year-old mother Ann, who was from Donard in Dublin, died a w… [+786 chars]
